name: Sleep Safe and Sound
description:
Wander around a forest, follow a fairy, learn what happened to a dead game called "Sweet Dreams," look for secrets, and hopefully feel relaxed.

I made this game for a class, and basically our prompt was to make a walking-simulator that eulogizes a fictional game that is dead.

This game is kind of a mess, and I don't know if it accomplishes any of its goals, but I'm proud of it and wanted to share it.  It can take just minutes to go through, but I encourage you to take your time to think if you need to relax, or to explore if you feel curious.

Also, for the Mac build, I don't have a good way to conveniently test it, so I don't know if it actually works.  So PLEASE please please don't give me any money whatsoever for the Mac version without testing to see if it works first.  I'm really sorry if it doesn't work, but hopefully I'll be able to learn how to deal with this sort of thing in the future.

Take care of yourself, and sleep well! <3
